review: Very impressed with the fire stick. Performance is better than Roku (I own earlier and later sold on Craigslist). Dishworld app used to buffer every 2 mins in Roku, however SlingTV works perfectly in firestick.
author: Advanx

review: It's works well, better then expected. I'm very pleased with my purchase.

review: I LOVE my Fire TV Stick! It was so easy to "install" and get started. I have just started using it and as stated, I do love it and if enough shows and movies are on it, (after more investigation), I may be able to give up cable and DirecTV and that would make it the ultimate product!
author: Kristi Brown "kbb"

review: Love it. And super easy to hookup. Think I will buy another one for my second TV.

review: Started great but lately it takes a lot of buffering. I don't know if the stick or my internet access.

review: We needed a way to watch netflix in our bedroom and this is awesome! It is very fast and easy to use! Amazon never disappoints :)
